snippet.title: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit the website: https://atelier.games/yumia/uk/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=AnnouncementUK&utm_id=Caption

An alchemy RPG themed around 'memory',  "Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land" is coming early 2025 for PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and Steam® via PC. 

Follow us: 
X: https://x.com/koeitecmoeurope
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/koeitecmoeurope/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/koeitecmogames
Gust Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ateliergames
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/KTEurope

*Screens are taken from an in-development version.
